articles.title: With delta, is it even safe to go to music festivals or outdoor concerts? Here's what experts say - CNBC
articles.description: Lollapalooza welcomed thousands of people to Chicago for a four-day music festival. Attendees had to show proof of vaccination or a negative Covid test within 72 hours. But does that mean outdoor music festivals are safe?

Outdoor music festival Lollapalooza brought thousands of people to Chicago's Grant Park.
